name: Summer Boot Camp - Learn skills that help in Creative Writing, Design Thinking, Video Editing
content: At Knowledgeum Academy, we encourage the holistic well-being of learners which includes enabling opportunities that go beyond academics. This year, a host of activities are planned offline where learners can have a well-deserved break while learning something interesting. At the boot camp, the comprehensive programmes place special emphasis on critical thinking, research, and engagement with diverse ideas and perspectives, while inculcating the values of inquisitiveness, analytical thinking, and effective problem-solving. It also enables learners to hone their aptitude, creativity, imagination, and time management skills that are essential currently & to excel in the future. For Students Camp Objectives • To allow for a deep dive into new skills • To help with mental stimulation • To lead to a new type of friendship / team-building • To help participants build a unique interest Learn skills that help in CREATIVE WRITING This session comprises various aspects of academic writing such as clarity, concision, focus and structure. DESIGN THINKING Students will be familiarized with visual thinking that would act as a tool for creating, ideating and articulating their thought process. VIDEO EDITING In this introductory video editing course students will understand the basic technical and aesthetic approach of editing.
